name: chatgpt-queue
description: Queue prompts and auto-send after each reply finishes.

scripts.lint: eslint src scripts --ext .ts,.tsx --max-warnings=0 && echo '[32m✔ Lint check passed[0m' || { echo '[31m✖ Lint check failed[0m'; exit 1; }
scripts.typecheck: tsc --noEmit && echo '[32m✔ TypeScript check passed[0m' || { echo '[31m✖ TypeScript check failed[0m'; exit 1; }
scripts.check: sh -c 'pnpm lint; L=$?; pnpm typecheck; T=$?; if [ "$L" -eq 0 ] && [ "$T" -eq 0 ]; then echo "\u001b[32m✔ Lint and TypeScript check passed\u001b[0m"; elif [ "$L" -ne 0 ] && [ "$T" -ne 0 ]; then echo "\u001b[31m✖ Both lint and TypeScript failed\u001b[0m"; elif [ "$L" -ne 0 ]; then echo "\u001b[31m✖ Lint failed\u001b[0m"; else echo "\u001b[31m✖ TypeScript check failed\u001b[0m"; fi'
scripts.test: pnpm run typecheck && pnpm run test:storage && pnpm run test:models && pnpm run test:attachments
